name: extract_date_tokens

parameters.name: column_id
parameters.description: The column on which apply this action to
parameters.label: Column

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: The row on which apply this action to
parameters.label: Row

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The transformation scope (CELL | LINE | COLUMN | TABLE)
parameters.label: Scope

parameters.name: YEAR
parameters.description: Extracts year field
parameters.label: Year

parameters.name: MONTH
parameters.description: Extracts month of year field
parameters.label: Month of year

parameters.name: DAY
parameters.description: Extracts day of month field
parameters.label: Day of month

parameters.name: HOUR_12
parameters.description: Extracts the hour within the AM/PM, from 0 to 11
parameters.label: Hour of am-pm

parameters.name: AM_PM
parameters.description: Extracts the AM/PM within the day, from 0 (AM) to 1 (PM)
parameters.label: The am-pm-of-day

parameters.name: HOUR_24
parameters.description: Extracts the hour within the day, from 0 to 23
parameters.label: Hour of day

parameters.name: MINUTE
parameters.description: Extracts minute of hour
parameters.label: Minute

parameters.name: SECOND
parameters.description: Extracts second of minute
parameters.label: Second

parameters.name: DAY_OF_WEEK
parameters.description: Extracts the day of week, such as Tuesday
parameters.label: Day of week

parameters.name: DAY_OF_YEAR
parameters.description: Extracts the day of year. This has values from 1 to 365 in standard years and 1 to 366 in leap years
parameters.label: Day of year

parameters.name: WEEK_OF_YEAR
parameters.description: Extracts concept of the count of weeks within the period of a year where the weeks are aligned to the start of the year
parameters.label: Week of year

description: Creates columns with year, month, day, etc...
label: Extract date tokens
